content: Third Vision: The Man with the Tape Measure
I said, “What are you up to?”
Just then the Messenger-Angel on his way out
“Run! Tell the Surveyor, ‘Jerusalem will burst its walls—
And I’ll be right there with her’—’s Decree—‘a wall of fire
“Up on your feet! Get out of there—and now!”  says so.
I scattered you to the four winds.” ’s Decree.

-of-the-Angel-Armies, the One of Glory who sent me on my mission, commenting on the godless nations who stripped you and left you homeless, said, “Anyone who hits you, hits me—bloodies my nose, blackens my eye. Yes, and at the right time I’ll give the signal and they’ll be stripped and thrown out by their own servants.” Then you’ll know for sure that -of-the-Angel-Armies sent me on this mission.* * *

Many godless nations will be linked up with  at that time. (“They will become my family! I’ll live in their homes!”) And then you’ll know for sure that -of-the-Angel-Armies sent me on this mission.  will reclaim his Judah inheritance in the Holy Land. He’ll again make clear that Jerusalem is his choice.* * *
Quiet, everyone! Shh! Silence before . Something’s afoot in his holy house. He’s on the move!
